Name: Landmarks, 547-Seat Primary School Facility, Bronx (G 250069 SCX).
Title: Application number G 250069 SCX (547-Seat Primary School Facility) pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new, 547-seat primary school facility, located at 1631-1659 Zerega Avenue, (Block 3991, Lots 87, 78, 75, and 6), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 10, Council District 18, Community School District 11.
